member.name: D2D1_PATCH_EDGE_MODE
member.summary: Specifies how to render gradient mesh edges.

member.name: D2D1_PATCH_EDGE_MODE.D2D1_PATCH_EDGE_MODE_ALIASED
member.summary: Render this patch edge aliased. Use this value for the internal edges of your gradient mesh.

member.name: D2D1_PATCH_EDGE_MODE.D2D1_PATCH_EDGE_MODE_ANTIALIASED
member.summary: Render this patch edge antialiased. Use this value for the external (boundary) edges of your mesh.

member.name: D2D1_PATCH_EDGE_MODE.D2D1_PATCH_EDGE_MODE_ALIASED_INFLATED
member.summary: Render this patch edge aliased and also slightly inflated. Use this for the internal edges of your gradient mesh when there could be t-junctions among patches. Inflating the internal edges mitigates seams that can appear along those junctions.
